",n(i.p,{children:"Looking back now, I believe the effort has been rewarded in a way that feels fair and well-earned."}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"Starting at a new company on the first day of May feels symbolic. A new month. A new rhythm. A new mindset. I am entering this chapter with humility, curiosity, and a renewed sense of responsibility for my own growth."}),"
